sentences.text: NOTICE OF 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS AND PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wyndham Worldwide Corporation 22 Sylvan Way Parsippany, New Jersey 07054
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 29, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the entire Board I would like to start by thanking you for the trust you have placed in us to act as stewards of your Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, I am proud to lead a Board that is dedicated to serving you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held on Tuesday, May 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will start at 11:30 a.m. local time at Wyndham Worldwide Corporation, 22 Sylvan Way, Parsippany, New Jersey 07054.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our unmatched distribution at every price point makes our Company unique in the hospitality industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With our focus on asset-light, fee-for-service business models, and our industry- leading, award-winning Wyndham Rewards program, our suite of brands have grown into category leaders to meet the needs of the everyday traveler.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 was a solid year for our Company, with earnings growth and free cash flow generation both in line with our commitments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revenue reached $5.6 billion, a 1% increase over 2015 and net income was $611 million, flat compared to 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our adjusted net income rose to $636 million, a 5% increase over 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted EBITDA increased 6% over the prior year or 7% excluding the impact of foreign exchange and acquisitions, consistent with our long-term, compound annual growth rate target of 6-8%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We posted 2016 diluted earnings per share of $5.53, an 8% increase over 2015, and diluted adjusted earnings per share of $5.75, a 13% increase over 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These results reflect strong execution and careful expense management, offsetting higher loan losses and unfavorable foreign exchange rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also continued to return capital to you in 2016 by repurchasing $625 million of our shares under our share repurchase program and paying cash dividends of $223 million and in February 2017 we increased our dividend by 16%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance and Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Board welcomed a new Director, Louise F. Brady.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Brady brings a unique and exceptional perspective to the Board with her background in investing and unlocking growth and value through emerging technologies that strongly aligns with our goals to expand our nnovative hospitality offerings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee seeks to ensure that executive pay and Company performance are appropriately aligned and continues to incentivize management with the goal of increasing shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee approved an executive compensation program in 2016 that utilized profitability-based targets to focus our executives on short-term performance and equity awards to promote retention and long-term share price appreciation to drive shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As evidence of our pay-for-performance culture, notwithstanding the Companys solid 2016 operating performance, because our largest business unit, Wyndham Vacation Ownership, did not meet the minimum profitability threshold for an annual incentive compensation payout, I suggested and the Committee independently determined that my annual incentive compensation award would be zero for 2016 to emphasize to all stakeholders our commitment to accountability and aligning Company interests with your interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: *Please see Appendix A to the Proxy Statement for information on non-GAAP reconciliations and forward looking statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this proxy statement, we provide details on two changes to our executive compensation program for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We revised the peer group we use for compensation benchmarking and, to further align my interests with yours, we modified my compensation structure to increase the percentage that is performance-based and at-risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I appreciate the opportunity to provide you with our 2016 highlights and encourage you to read the proxy statement carefully for more information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting, please cast your vote as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I look forward to continuing our dialogue in the future and I, along with our outstanding executive team and 38,000 associates worldwide, remain committed to creating even greater shareholder value for you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Very truly yours,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stephen P. Holmes Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Date: Tuesday, May 9, 2017 Time: 11:30 a.m. local time Place: Wyndham Worldwide Corporation 22 Sylvan Way Parsippany, New Jersey 07054
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Purposes of the meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to elect eight Directors for a term expiring at the 2018 annual meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote on an advisory resolution to approve executive compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote on an advisory resolution on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote on a proposal to ratify the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to vote on a shareholder proposal regarding political contributions disclosure if properly presented at the meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to transact any other business that may be properly brought before the meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The matters specified for voting above are more fully described in the attached proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only our shareholders of record at the close of business on March 17, 2017 will be entitled to notice of and to vote at the meeting and any adjournments or postponements for which no new record date is set.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may attend the meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only shareholders, persons holding proxies from shareholders, invited representatives of the media and financial community and other guests of Wyndham Worldwide Corporation may attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What to bring:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received (or requested and received) a printed copy of the proxy materials you should bring the enclosed Admission Ticket to gain admission to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (Notice) or voting instructions and will not be requesting a printed copy of the proxy materials please bring the Notice or voting instructions with you as your Admission Ticket.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All persons attending the meeting must bring photo identification such as a valid drivers license or passport for purposes of personal identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in the name of a broker, trust, bank or other nominee, you will also need to bring a proxy, letter or recent account statement from that broker, trust, bank or nominee that confirms that you are the beneficial owner of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 17, 2017 is the record date for the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that owners of Wyndham Worldwide common stock at the close of business on that date are entitled to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: receive notice of the meeting and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote at the meeting and any adjournments or postponements of the meeting for which no new record date is set.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information About the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead of mailing a printed copy of our proxy materials, including our Annual Report, to all of our shareholders, we provide access to these materials in a fast and efficient manner via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This reduces the amount of paper necessary to produce these materials as well as the costs associated with mailing these materials to all shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, on or about March 29, 2017, we will begin mailing a Notice to all shareholders as of March 17, 2017, and will post our proxy materials on the website referenced in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As more fully described in the Notice, shareholders may choose to access our proxy materials on the website referred to in the Notice or may request to receive a printed set of our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Notice and website provide information regarding how you may request to receive proxy materials in printed form by mail or electronically by email on an ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding Information:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted a procedure approved by the Securities and Exchange Commission called householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this procedure, shareholders of record who have the same address and last name and have not previously requested electronic delivery of proxy materials will receive a single envelope containing the Notices for all shareholders having that address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice for each shareholder will include that shareholders unique control number needed to vote his or her shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This procedure will reduce our printing costs and postage fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not wish to participate in householding and prefer to receive your Notice in a separate envelope, please contact Broadridge Financial Solutions by calling their tollfree number at (866) 5407095 or through Broadridge Financial Solutions, Attn.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: : Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For those shareholders who have the same address and last name and who request to receive a printed copy of the proxy materials by mail, we will send only one copy of such materials to each address unless one or more of those shareholders notifies us, in the same manner described above, that they wish to receive a printed copy for each shareholder at that address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial shareholders may request information about householding from their banks, brokers or other holders of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Voting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote your proxy promptly so your shares are represented, even if you plan to attend the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by Internet, by telephone, by requesting a printed copy of the proxy materials and using the enclosed proxy card or in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our proxy tabulator, Broadridge Financial Solutions, must receive any proxy that will not be delivered in person at the annual meeting by 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Daylight Time on Monday, May 8, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The enclosed proxy materials are provided to you at the request of the Board of Directors of Wyndham Worldwide Corporation (Board) to encourage you to vote your shares at our 2017 annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement contains information on matters that will be presented at the meeting and is provided to assist you in voting your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: References in this proxy statement to we, us, our and Wyndham Worldwide refer to Wyndham Worldwide Corporation and our consolidated subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board made these materials available to you over the Internet or, upon your request, mailed you printed versions of these materials in connection with our 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will mail a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (Notice) to our shareholders beginning on or about March 29, 2017 and will post our proxy materials on our website referenced in the Notice on that same date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are, on behalf of our Board, soliciting your proxy to vote your shares at our 2017 annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We solicit proxies to give all shareholders of record an opportunity to vote on matters that will be presented at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When and where will the annual meeting be held?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual meeting will be held on Tuesday, May 9, 2017 at 11:30 a.m. local time at Wyndham Worldwide Corporation, 22 Sylvan Way, Parsippany, New Jersey 07054.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What am I being asked to vote on at the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are being asked to vote on the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the election of eight Directors for a oneyear term
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the approval of our executive compensation program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the ratification of the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a shareholder proposal regarding political contributions disclosure if properly presented at the meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to transact any other business that may be properly brought before the meeting or any adjournment or postponement of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are not aware of any other matters that will be brought before the shareholders for a vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any other matters are properly presented for a vote the individuals named as proxies will have discretionary authority to the extent permitted by law to vote on such matters according to their best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may vote and how many votes does a shareholder have?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All holders of record of our common stock as of the close of business on March 17, 2017 (record date) are entitled to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each shareholder will have one vote for each share of our common stock held as of the close of business on the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the record date 104,740,966 shares of our common stock were outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is no cumulative voting and the holders of our common stock vote together as a single class.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes must be present to hold the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holders of a majority of the outstanding shares of our common stock entitled to vote at the meeting, or 52,370,484 shares, also known as a quorum, must be present in person or by proxy at the meeting in order to constitute a quorum necessary to conduct the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker nonvotes will be counted for the purposes of establishing a quorum at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker nonvote occurs when a broker or other nominee submits a proxy that states that the broker does not vote for some or all of the proposals because the broker has not received instructions from the beneficial owner on how to vote on the proposals and does not have discretionary authority to vote in the absence of instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We urge you to vote by proxy even if you plan to attend the meeting so that we will know as soon as possible that a quorum has been achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the meeting you are encouraged to vote by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder of record, also known as a registered shareholder, you may vote in one of the following ways:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by telephone by calling the tollfree number (800) 6906903 (have your Notice or proxy card in hand when you call)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by Internet at http://www.proxyvote.com (have your Notice or proxy card in hand when you access the website)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if you received (or requested and received) a printed copy of the annual meeting materials, by returning the enclosed proxy card (signed and dated) in the envelope provided or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in person at the annual meeting (please see below under How do I attend the meeting?).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in the name of a bank, broker or other nominee, follow the proxy instructions on the form you receive from the bank, broker or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also vote in person at the annual meeting  please see below under How do I attend the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When you vote by proxy your shares will be voted according to your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign your proxy card or vote by Internet or by telephone but do not specify how you want your shares to be voted they will be voted as the Board recommends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What if I am a participant in the Wyndham Worldwide Corporation Employee Savings Plan?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For participants in the Wyndham Worldwide Corporation Employee Savings Plan with shares of our common stock credited to their accounts, voting instructions for the trustees of the plan are also being solicited through this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the provisions of the plan the trustee will vote shares of our common stock in accordance with instructions received from the participants to whose accounts the shares are credited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not instruct the plan trustee on how to vote the shares of our common stock credited to your account the trustee will vote those shares in proportion to the shares for which instructions are received.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How does the Board recommend that I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends the following votes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of each of the Director nominees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval of our executive compensation program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: for the advisory vote on executive compensation to be held EVERY YEAR
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AGAINST the shareholder proposal regarding political contributions disclosure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are required to approve each proposal?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the election of Directors the affirmative vote of a plurality of the votes present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote at the meeting is required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means the Director nominees receiving the greatest number of votes will be elected and abstentions and broker nonvotes will have no effect on the outcome of the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, as further described under Election of Directors, under the Boards Corporate Governance Guidelines any nominee for Director who receives a greater number of votes withheld than votes for election is required to tender his or her resignation for consideration by the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the proposal regarding the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation, the choice (i.e., every year, every two years or every three years) receiving the highest number of votes cast by shareholders will be considered by the Board as the expressed preference of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will have no effect on the outcome of the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For all other proposals, the affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the shares represented at the meeting in person or by proxy and entitled to vote on the proposal will be required for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will have the effect of a vote against any of these proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker nonvotes will have no effect on the outcome of these proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in the name of a bank, broker or other financial institution and you do not give your broker or other nominee specific voting instructions for your shares, under rules of the New York Stock Exchange, your record holder has discretion to vote your shares on the ratification of auditor proposal but does not have discretion to vote your shares on any of the other proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker, bank or other financial institution will not be permitted to vote on your behalf on the election of Director nominees, the advisory vote on executive compensation, the advisory vote regarding the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation or the shareholder proposal regarding political contributions disclosure unless you provide specific instructions before the date of the annual meeting by completing and returning the voting instruction or proxy card or following the instructions provided to you to vote your shares by telephone or the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I attend the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received (or requested and received) a printed copy of the proxy materials, you should bring the enclosed Admission Ticket to gain admission to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice or voting instructions and will not be requesting a printed copy of the proxy materials please bring the Notice or voting instructions with you as your Admission Ticket.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must bring with you a photo identification such as a valid drivers license or passport for personal identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in the name of a broker, trust, bank or other nominee, you will also need to bring a proxy, letter or recent account statement from that broker, trust, bank or nominee that confirms that you are the beneficial owner of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change or revoke my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may change or revoke your proxy at any time prior to voting at the meeting by submitting a later dated proxy, by entering new instructions by Internet or telephone, by giving timely written notice of such change or revocation to the Corporate Secretary or by attending the meeting and voting in person and requesting that your prior proxy not be used.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are proxies solicited?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We retained D.F. King & Co., Inc. to advise and assist us in soliciting proxies at a cost of $9,000 plus reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may also be solicited by our Directors, officers and employees personally, by mail, telephone or other electronic means.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will pay all costs relating to the solicitation of proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will also reimburse brokers, custodians, nominees and fiduciaries for reasonable expenses in forwarding proxy materials to beneficial owners of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I make a shareholder proposal for the 2018 meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders interested in presenting a proposal for inclusion in our proxy statement and proxy relating to our 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders may do so by following the procedures prescribed in Rule 14a8 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be eligible for inclusion in next years proxy statement, shareholder proposals must be received by the Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices no later than the close of business on November 29, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, any shareholder proposal to be considered at next years annual meeting but not included in the proxy statement must be submitted in accordance with the procedures set forth in our ByLaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of any such proposal must be submitted in writing to and received by the Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices not earlier than January 9, 2018 and not later than February 8, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if the date of the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders is not within 30 days before or after May 9, 2018 then a shareholder will be able to submit a proposal for consideration at the annual meeting not later than the close of business on the 10th day following the day on which public disclosure of the date of the annual meeting is made or such notice of the date of such annual meeting was mailed whichever occurs first.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our ByLaws require that such notice be updated as necessary as of specified dates prior to the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any notification to bring any proposal before an Annual Meeting of Shareholders must comply with the requirements of our ByLaws as to proper form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder may obtain a copy of our ByLaws on our website or by writing to our Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may also nominate directors for election at an annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To nominate a Director shareholders must comply with provisions of applicable law and our ByLaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee will also consider shareholder recommendations for candidates to the Board sent to the Committee c/o the Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See below under Director Nomination Process for information regarding nomination or recommendation of a Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GOVERNANCE OF THE COMPANY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strong corporate governance is an integral part of our core values.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is committed to having sound corporate governance principles and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please visit our website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com under the Investors/Corporate Governance page, which can be reached by clicking on the Investors link followed by the Corporate Governance link, for the Boards Corporate Governance Guidelines and Director Independence Criteria, the Boardapproved charters for the Audit, Compensation and Corporate Governance Committees and related information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines and charters may be obtained by writing to our Corporate Secretary at Wyndham Worldwide Corporation, 22 Sylvan Way, Parsippany, New Jersey 07054.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board adopted Corporate Governance Guidelines that along with the charters of the Board Committees, Director Independence Criteria and Code of Business Conduct and Ethics for Directors, provide the framework for our governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The governance rules for companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange and those contained in the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rules and regulations are reflected in the guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board reviews these principles and other aspects of governance periodically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Guidelines are available on the Investors/Corporate Governance page of our website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence Criteria
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board adopted the Director Independence Criteria set out below for its evaluation of the materiality of Director relationships with us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director Independence Criteria contain independence standards that exceed the independence standards specified in the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director Independence Criteria are available on  the  Investors/Corporate  Governance  page  of  our  website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Director who satisfies all of the following criteria shall be presumed to be independent under our Director Independence Criteria:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wyndham Worldwide does not currently employ and has not within the last three years employed the Director or any of his or her immediate family members (except in the case of immediate family members, in a nonexecutive officer capacity).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director is not currently and has not within the last three years been employed by Wyndham Worldwides present auditors nor has any of his or her immediate family members been so employed (except in a nonprofessional capacity not involving Wyndham Worldwide business).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither the Director nor any of his or her immediate family members is or has been within the last three years part of an interlocking directorate in which an executive officer of Wyndham Worldwide serves on the compensation or equivalent committee of another company that employs the Director or his or her immediate family member as an executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director is not a current employee nor is an immediate family member a current executive officer of a company that has made payments to or received payments from Wyndham Worldwide for property or services in an amount in any of the last three fiscal years exceeding the greater of $750,000 or 1% of such other companys consolidated gross revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director currently does not have or has not had within the past three years a personal services contract with Wyndham Worldwide or its executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director has not received and the Directors immediate family member has not received during any twelvemonth period within the last three years more than $100,000 in direct compensation from Wyndham Worldwide other than Board fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director is not currently an officer or director of a foundation, university or other nonprofit organization to which Wyndham Worldwide within the last three years gave directly or indirectly through the provision of services more than the greater of 1% of the consolidated gross revenues of such organization during any single fiscal year or $100,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Guidelines for Determining Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines and Director Independence Criteria provide for director independence standards that meet or exceed those of the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is required under New York Stock Exchange rules to affirmatively determine that each Director has no material relationship with Wyndham Worldwide other than as a Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with these standards and criteria the Board undertook its annual review of the independence of its Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During this review the Board considered whether there are any relationships or related party transactions between each Director, any member of his or her immediate family or other affiliated entities and us and our subsidiaries and affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of this review was to determine whether any such relationships or transactions existed that were inconsistent with a determination that the Director is independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board follows a number of procedures to review related party transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain a written policy governing related party transactions that requires Board approval of related party transactions exceeding $120,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board member answers a questionnaire designed to disclose conflicts and related party transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also review our internal records for related party transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on a review of these standards and materials, none of our nonmanagement Directors had or has any relationship with us other than as a Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of its review the Board affirmatively determined that the following Directors are independent of us and our management as required by the New York Stock Exchange listing standards and the Director Independence Criteria: Myra J. Biblowit, Louise F. Brady, James E. Buckman, George Herrera, The Right Honourable Brian Mulroney, Pauline D.E. Richards and Michael H. Wargotz.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the Audit, Compensation and Corporate Governance Committees are independent Directors under the New York Stock Exchange listing standards, SEC rules and the Director Independence Criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committees of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following describes our Board Committees and related matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The composition of the Committees is provided immediately after.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Responsibilities include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appoints our independent registered public accounting firm to perform an integrated audit of our consolidated financial statements and internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Preapproves all services performed by our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provides oversight on the external reporting process and the adequacy of our internal controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews the scope, planning, staffing and budgets of the audit activities of the independent registered public accounting firm and our internal auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews services provided by our independent registered public accounting firm and other disclosed relationships as they bear on the independence of our independent registered public accounting firm and provides oversight on hiring policies with respect to employees or former employees of the independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maintains procedures for the receipt, retention and resolution of complaints regarding accounting, internal controls and auditing matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the Audit Committee are independent Directors under the Boards Director Independence Criteria and applicable regulatory and listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board in its business judgment determined that each member of the Audit Committee is financially literate, knowledgeable and qualified to review financial statements in accordance with applicable listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also determined that both Pauline D.E. Richards and Michael H. Wargotz are audit committee financial experts within the meaning of applicable SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Charter is available on the Investors/Corporate Governance page of our website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board of Directors assists the Board in fulfilling its oversight responsibilities for the external financial reporting process and the adequacy of Wyndham Worldwides internal controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific responsibilities of the Audit Committee are set forth in the Audit Committee Charter adopted by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Charter is available on the Investors/Corporate Governance page of our website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is comprised of four Directors, all of whom meet the standards of independence adopted by the New York Stock Exchange and the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee appoints, compensates and oversees the services performed by Wyndham Worldwides independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee approves in advance all services to be performed by Wyndham Worldwides independent registered public accounting firm in accordance with SEC rules and the Audit Committees established policy for pre- approval of all audit services and permissible non-audit services, subject to the de minimis exceptions for non-audit services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for Wyndham Worldwides financial reporting process including our system of internal controls and for the preparation of consolidated financial statements in compliance with generally accepted accounting principles, applicable laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, management is responsible for establishing, maintaining and assessing the effectiveness of Wyndham Worldwides internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deloitte & Touche LLP (Deloitte), Wyndham Worldwides independent registered public accounting firm, is responsible for expressing an opinion on Wyndham Worldwides consolidated financial statements and the effectiveness of Wyndham Worldwides internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed and discussed Wyndham Worldwides 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K, including the audited consolidated financial statements of Wyndham Worldwide for the year ended December 31, 2016, with management and Deloitte.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is not the Audit Committees duty or responsibility to conduct auditing or accounting reviews or procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also discussed with Deloitte matters required to be discussed by applicable standards and rules of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) and the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also received the written disclosures and the letter from Deloitte required by applicable standards and rules of the PCAOB including those required by Auditing Standard No. 1301,  Communications with Audit Committees, and the SEC regarding Deloittes communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence, and discussed with Deloitte its independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also considered whether the permissible non-audit services provided by Deloitte to Wyndham Worldwide are compatible with Deloitte maintaining its independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee satisfied itself as to the independence of Deloitte.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the Audit Committees review and discussions described above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board of Directors that the audited consolidated financial statements be included in Wyndham Worldwides Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and approves Chief Executive Officer (CEO) and other senior management compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approves grants of longterm incentive awards and our senior executives annual incentive compensation under our compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and considers the independence of advisers to the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For additional information regarding the Compensation Committees processes and procedures see below under Executive Compensation  Compensation Discussion and Analysis  Compensation Committee Matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee Report is provided below under Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee Charter is available on the Investors/Corporate Governance page on our website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016,  Mr. Mulroney, Ms. Biblowit and Ms. Richards served on our Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no compensation committee interlocks between Wyndham Worldwide and other entities involving our executive officers and Directors.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommends to the Board nominees for election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews principles, policies and procedures affecting Directors and the Boards operation and effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provides oversight on the evaluation of the Board and its effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and makes recommendations on Director compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the Corporate Governance Committee are independent Directors under the Boards Director Independence Criteria and applicable regulatory and listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee Charter is available on the Investors/Corporate Governance page on our website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Committee may exercise all of the authority of the Board when the Board is not in session, except that the Executive Committee does not have the authority to take any action which legally or under our internal governance policies may be taken only by the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

Wargotz C     M Number of Meetings in 2016 9 5 4 2

sentences.text: The Board held four meetings during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Director attended at least 75% of the meetings of the Board and the committees of the Board on which the Director served while in office.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors fulfill their responsibilities not only by attending Board and committee meetings but also through communication with the Chairman and CEO, Lead Director and other members of management relative to matters of interest and concern to Wyndham Worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that Wyndham Worldwides CEO is best situated to serve as Chairman because he is the Director most familiar with our business and industry and most capable of effectively identifying strategic priorities and leading the discussion and execution of strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Directors and management have different perspectives and roles in strategy development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent Directors bring experience, oversight and expertise from outside our company and industry while the CEO brings companyspecific experience and expertise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that the combined role of Chairman and CEO promotes strategy development and execution and facilitates information flow between management and the Board all of which are essential to effective governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of the key responsibilities of the Board is to review our strategic direction and hold management accountable for the execution of strategy once it is developed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes the combined role of Chairman and CEO, together with an independent Lead Director having the duties described below, is in the best interest of shareholders because it provides the appropriate balance between strategy review and independent oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board selected James E. Buckman, an independent Director who serves as a member of the Executive Committee, to serve as the Boards Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director serves as a key advisor to the Chairman and the Board; chairs executive sessions of the nonmanagement Directors and provides
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: feedback to the Chairman; chairs meetings of the Board in the absence of the Chairman; and reviews in advance and consults with the Chairman when necessary regarding the agendas for all Board and committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversight of Risk Management
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has an active role, as a whole and at the committee level, in providing oversight with respect to management of our risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board focuses on the most significant risks facing us and our general risk management strategy and seeks to ensure that risks undertaken by us are consistent with a level of risk that is appropriate for our company and aligned with the achievement of our business objectives and strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board regularly reviews information regarding risks associated with our finances, credit and liquidity; our business, operations and strategy; legal, regulatory and compliance matters; and reputational exposure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee provides oversight on our programs for risk assessment and risk management, including with respect to financial accounting and reporting, information technology, cybersecurity and compliance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee provides oversight on our assessment and management of risks relating to our executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee provides oversight on our management of risks associated with the independence of the Board and potential conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While each committee is responsible for providing oversight with respect to the management of risks, the entire Board is regularly informed about our risks through committee reports and management presentations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Board and the committees provide oversight with respect to our risk management, our CEO and other senior management are primarily responsible for daytoday risk management analysis and mitigation and report to the full Board or the relevant committee regarding risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our leadership structure, with Mr. Holmes serving as Chairman and CEO, also enhances the Boards effectiveness in risk oversight due to Mr. Holmes extensive knowledge of our business and operations, facilitating the Boards oversight of key risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this division of responsibility and leadership structure is the most effective approach for addressing our risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Sessions of NonManagement Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board meets regularly without any members of management present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director chairs these sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications with the Board and Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders and other parties interested in communicating directly with the Board, an individual nonmanagement Director or the nonmanagement Directors as a group may do so by writing our Corporate Secretary at Wyndham Worldwide Corporation, 22 Sylvan Way, Parsippany, New Jersey 07054.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Secretary will forward the correspondence only to the intended recipients.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, prior to forwarding any correspondence, the Corporate Secretary will review it and in his discretion will not forward correspondence deemed to be of a commercial nature or otherwise not appropriate for review by the Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Attendance at Annual Meeting of Shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As provided in the Boards Corporate Governance Guidelines, Directors are expected to attend our annual meeting of shareholders absent exceptional cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our Directors at the time attended our 2016 annual meeting and all of our current Directors are expected to attend the 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Business Conduct and Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted a Code of Business Conduct and Ethics for Directors with ethics guidelines specifically applicable to Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we adopted Business Principles applicable to all our associates, including our CEO, Chief Financial Officer and Chief Accounting Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will disclose on our website any amendment to or waiver from a provision of our Business Principles or Code of Business Conduct and Ethics for Directors as may be required and within the time period specified under applicable
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SEC and New York Stock Exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Business Conduct and Ethics for Directors and our Business Principles are available on the Investors/Corporate Governance page of our website at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Copies of these documents may also be obtained free of charge by writing to our Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nomination Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee is responsible for recommending the Director nominees for election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee considers the appropriate balance of experience, skills and characteristics required of the Board when considering potential candidates to serve on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees for Director are selected on the basis of their depth and breadth of experience, skills, wisdom, integrity, ability to make independent analytical inquiries, understanding of our business environment and willingness to devote adequate time to Board duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee also focuses on issues of diversity, such as diversity of gender, race and national origin, education, professional experience and differences in viewpoints and skills.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee does not have a formal policy with respect to diversity, however, the Board and the Corporate Governance Committee believe that it is essential that the Board members represent diverse viewpoints.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering candidates for the Board, the Corporate Governance Committee considers the entirety of each candidates credentials in the context of these standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the nomination of continuing Directors for reelection, the Corporate Governance Committee also considers the individuals contributions to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our Directors bring to our Board a wealth of executive leadership experience derived from their service as senior executives of large organizations as well as extensive board experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain individual qualifications, experience and skills of our Directors that led the Board to conclude that each nominee or Director should serve as our Director are described below under Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identification and Evaluation Process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The process for identifying and evaluating nominees to the Board is initiated by identifying a candidate who meets the criteria for selection as a nominee and has the specific qualities or skills being sought based on input from members of the Board and, if the Corporate Governance Committee deems appropriate, a thirdparty search firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These candidates will be evaluated by the Corporate Governance Committee by reviewing the candidates biographical information and qualifications and checking the candidates references.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Qualified nominees will be interviewed by at least one member of the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Using the input from the interview and other information it obtains, the Corporate Governance Committee evaluates whether the prospective candidate is qualified to serve as a Director and whether the Corporate Governance Committee should recommend to the Board that the Board nominate the prospective candidate for election by the shareholders or to fill a vacancy on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Recommendations of Nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee will consider written recommendations from shareholders for nominees for Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommendations should be submitted to the Corporate Governance Committee, c/o the Corporate Secretary, and include at least the following: name of the shareholder and evidence of the persons ownership of our common stock, number of shares owned and the length of time of ownership, name of the candidate, the candidates resume or a listing of his or her qualifications to be a Director and the persons consent to be named as a Director if selected by the Corporate Governance Committee and nominated by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To evaluate nominees for Directors recommended by shareholders, the Corporate Governance Committee intends to use a substantially similar evaluation process as described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Nominations and ByLaw Procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our ByLaws establish procedures pursuant to which a shareholder may nominate a person for election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our ByLaws  are  posted  on  our  website  under  Investors/Corporate  Governance at www.wyndhamworldwide.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To nominate a person for election to the Board, a shareholder must submit a notice containing all information required by our ByLaws regarding the Director nominee and the shareholder and any associated persons making the nomination, including name and address, number of shares owned, a description of any additional interests of such nominee or shareholder and certain representations regarding such nomination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our ByLaws require that such notice be updated as necessary as of specified dates prior to the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To nominate a person for election to the Board at our annual meeting of shareholders, written notice of a shareholder nomination must be delivered to our Corporate Secretary not less than 90 nor more than 120 days prior to the anniversary date of the prior years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if our annual meeting is advanced or delayed by more than 30 days from the anniversary date of the previous years meeting, a shareholders written notice will be timely if it is delivered by no later than the close of business on the 10th day following the day on which public disclosure of the date of the annual meeting is made or the notice of the date of the annual meeting was mailed, whichever occurs first.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At a special meeting of shareholders, only such business may be conducted as shall have been brought before the meeting under our notice of meeting.

sentences.text: Compensation of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nonmanagement Directors receive compensation for Board service designed to compensate them for their Board responsibilities and align their interests with the interests of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A management Director receives no additional compensation for Board service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director compensation program for 2016 remained consistent with our 2015 program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table describes 2016 annual retainer and committee chair and membership fees for nonmanagement Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Directors do not receive additional fees for attending Board or committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to these fees, to further align our Directors interests with those of our shareholders, the 2016 compensation of each of our nonmanagement Directors included a $100,000 annual equity grant of timevested restricted stock units (RSUs) which vest over a fouryear period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RSUs are credited with dividend equivalents subject to the same vesting restrictions as the underlying units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual Director retainer and committee chair and membership fees are paid on a quarterly basis 50% in cash and 50% in Wyndham Worldwide stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The requirement for Directors to receive at least 50% of their fees in our equity further aligns their interests with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of shares of stock issued is based on our stock price on the quarterly determination date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may elect to receive the stockbased portion of their fees in the form of common stock or deferred stock units (DSUs).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may also elect to defer any cashbased compensation or vested RSUs in the form of DSUs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A DSU entitles the Director to receive one share of common stock following the Directors retirement or termination of service from the Board for any reason and is credited with dividend equivalents during the deferral period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director may not sell or receive value from any DSU prior to termination of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NonManagement Director Stock Ownership Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Guidelines require each nonmanagement Director to comply with Wyndham Worldwides NonManagement Director Stock Ownership Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines require each nonmanagement Director to beneficially own an amount of our stock equal to the greater of a multiple of at least five times the cash portion of the annual retainer or two and onehalf times the total retainer value without regard to Board committee fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DSUs and RSUs credited to a Director count towards satisfaction of the guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2016, all of our nonmanagement Directors met or exceeded the stock ownership requirements.

sentences.text: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the date of this proxy statement, the Board of Directors consists of eight members, seven of whom are nonmanagement, independent Directors under applicable listing standards and our corporate governance documents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recognizes the importance of board refreshment in terms of achieving the appropriate mix of institutional knowledge and experience that our longer-tenured Directors bring to the Board and fresh perspectives that newer Directors bring to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In furtherance of this objective,  the Board increased the number of Directors constituting the Board by one and appointed Ms. Louise F. Brady as a Director in November 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Brady was recommended as a nominee by our Chairman and CEO and our Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our newly reconstituted Board, consisting of Ms. Brady and seven continuing directors, brings diverse and extensive professional, financial and business experience while balancing independence and tenure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board expects to continue to evaluate its membership and composition on an ongoing basis to optimize its ability to further shareholder interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At this years meeting, our eight Directors are to be elected for terms expiring at the 2018 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the recommendation of the Corporate Governance Committee, the Board has nominated Stephen P. Holmes, Myra J. Biblowit, Louise F. Brady, James E. Buckman, George Herrera, The Right Honourable Brian Mulroney, Pauline D.E. Richards and Michael H. Wargotz, each of whom is presently a Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The eight nominees are listed below with brief biographies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not know of any reason why any nominee would be unable to serve as a Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee is unable to serve, the shares represented by all valid proxies will be voted for the election of such other person as the Board may nominate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Standard and Majority Vote Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Certificate of Incorporation and ByLaws provide for a plurality voting standard for the election of our Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under a plurality voting standard the nominee for each Director position with the most votes is elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Boards Corporate Governance Guidelines any nominee for Director in an uncontested election, such as this one where the number of nominees does not exceed the number of Directors to be elected, who receives a greater number of votes withheld from his or her election than votes for such election shall promptly tender his or her resignation following certification of the shareholder vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee will promptly consider the tendered resignation and will recommend to the Board whether to accept the tendered resignation or to take some other action, such as rejecting the tendered resignation and addressing the apparent underlying causes of the withheld votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making this recommendation the Corporate Governance Committee will consider all factors deemed relevant by its members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will act on the Corporate Governance Committees recommendation no later than at its first regularly scheduled meeting following certification of the shareholder vote but in any case no later than 120 days following the certification of the shareholder vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering the Corporate Governance Committees recommendation, the Board will review the factors considered by the Corporate Governance Committee and such additional information and factors the Board believes to be relevant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will promptly publicly disclose the Boards decision and process in a periodic or current report filed with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Director who tenders his or her resignation under this process will not participate in the Corporate Governance Committee recommendation or Board consideration regarding whether or not to accept the tendered resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, such Director shall remain active and engaged in all other committee and Board activities, deliberations and decisions during this Corporate Governance Committee and Board process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees for Election to the Board for a Term Expiring at the 2018 Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stephen P. Holmes, 60, has served as our Chairman, Chief Executive Officer and a Director since July 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Holmes was Vice Chairman and director of Cendant Corporation and Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Cendants Travel Content Division from December 1997 to July 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Holmes was Vice Chairman of HFS Incorporated from September 1996 to December 1997, a director of HFS from June 1994 to December 1997 and Executive Vice President, Treasurer and Chief Financial Officer of HFS from July 1990 to September 1996.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Holmes exceptional daytoday leadership as our CEO provides him with detailed strategic perspective and knowledge of our operations and industry that are critical to the Boards effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He possesses extensive public company management experience and is widely recognized as a visionary leader in the global hospitality industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Mr. Holmes leadership, we have focused our business on, among other things, generating significant earnings and cash flow and building worldrenowned hospitality brands, all of which increase shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Holmes specific experience, qualifications, attributes and skills described above led the Board to conclude that Mr. Holmes should serve as our Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Myra J. Biblowit, 68, has served as a Director since July 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since April 2001, Ms. Biblowit has served as President of The Breast Cancer Research Foundation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From July 1997 to March 2001, she served as Vice Dean for External Affairs for the New York University School of Medicine and Senior Vice President of the Mount SinaiNYU Health System.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From June 1991 to June 1997, Ms. Biblowit was Senior Vice President and Executive Director of the Capital Campaign for the American Museum of Natural History.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Biblowit served as a director of Cendant from April 2000 to August 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a director of Cendant and a Director of Wyndham Worldwide, Ms. Biblowit has gained a broad understanding of Wyndham Worldwides business, operations and culture.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Biblowits exceptional leadership experience with iconic research, educational and cultural institutions provides a unique perspective to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As President of The Breast Cancer Research Foundation, a dominant funder of research around the world, Ms. Biblowit brings to the Board a global perspective, marketing skills and a commitment to supporting our communities that add significant value to the Boards contribution to our success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Biblowits specific experience, qualifications, attributes and skills described above led the Board to conclude that Ms. Biblowit should serve as our Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Louise F. Brady, 52, has served as a Director since November 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since March 2013 she has served as the Managing Partner and co-founder of the venture capital fund Piedmont Capital Partners, LLC, which develops innovative technologies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She also currently serves as president of Blue Current, Inc., Advanced Chemotherapy  Technologies,  Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and  Faster,  LLC.

sentences.text: From September 1996 to October 2013, she served as Vice President of Investments at Wells Fargo Advisors Financial Services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Brady has spent her career focused on leading investment strategies and unlocking growth and value through developing innovative technologies in start-up companies, commercial banking and venture capital portfolio management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Bradys exceptional background and skills contribute financial expertise and perspective on innovation to our Board in areas that are important to our
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: business.

sentences.text: James E. Buckman, 72, has served as a Director since July 2006 and Lead Director since March 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From May 2007 to January 2012, Mr. Buckman served as Vice Chairman of York Capital Management, a hedge fund management company headquartered in New York City.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From May 1, 2010 to January 2012, Mr. Buckman also served as General Counsel of York Capital Management and from January 2007 to May 2007 he served as a Senior Consultant to York Capital Management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Buckman was General Counsel and a director of Cendant from December 1997 to August 2006, a Vice Chairman of Cendant from November 1998 to August 2006 and a Senior Executive Vice President of Cendant from December 1997 to November 1998.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Buckman was Senior Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Assistant Secretary of HFS Incorporated from May 1997 to December 1997, a director of HFS from June 1994 to December 1997 and Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Assistant Secretary of HFS from February 1992 to May 1997.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Buckman brings to the Board exceptional leadership, experience and perspective necessary to be our Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His service as a director, Vice Chairman and General Counsel of Cendant  and  a  Director  of  Wyndham  Worldwide  affords Mr. Buckman strong experience with Wyndham Worldwides business and operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Buckmans experience with leading hedge fund manager York Capital Management contributes valuable crossindustry experience and depth of knowledge.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Buckmans specific experience, qualifications, attributes and skills described above led the Board to conclude that Mr. Buckman should serve as our Director.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since December 2003, Mr. Herrera has served as President and Chief Executive Officer of HerreraCristina Group, Ltd., a Hispanicowned,  multidisciplinary  management  firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From August 1998 to January 2004, Mr. Herrera served as President and Chief Executive Officer of the U.S. Hispanic Chamber of Commerce.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Herrera provides the Board with exceptional leadership and management knowledge.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a Cendant director and a Director and Chair of the Corporate Governance Committee of Wyndham Worldwide, Mr. Herrera has gained a broad understanding of the role of the Board in our operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Herreras service as chief executive  officer  of  multidisciplinary  management  firm HerreraCristina Group, Ltd. contributes extensive and varied management, finance and corporate governance experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solid Financial and Operational Performance for Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016 our management team led by our named executive officers produced solid financial and operational results continuing a multi-year track record of delivering outstanding value to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following describes who we are and our mission:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are one of the worlds largest integrated hospitality companies, providing travelers with access to a collection of trusted hospitality brands in hotels, vacation ownership and unique accommodations including vacation exchange, holiday parks and managed home rentals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Welcoming people to experience travel the way they want, we provide travelers with the opportunity to have their ideal  travel experience regardless of location, budget or type of accommodation, all tied together by the industrys number one rated loyalty program, Wyndham Rewards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We create great experiences driven by our signature Count On Me! service culture and the core values guiding us to do business in a way that makes our associates, partners and shareholders proud.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistently recognized among FORTUNES Worlds Most Admired Companies and the Worlds Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere, our holistic integration of responsible environmental, social and governance (ESG) practices continues to be an important driver of our success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With a consistent focus on asset-light, fee-for-service business models, our suite of travel brands continues to grow into category leaders and are making bold moves today to meet the needs of tomorrows travelers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From a landmark hotel brand transformation and developing new experiences for the next generation of timeshare owners, to capturing the increasing demand for unique places to stay across the sharing economy and growing our loyalty program across our collective portfolio, we are embarking on our second decade embracing and fulfilling the needs of the everyday traveler.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We aim to make travel more accessible for more people to travel to more places than any other hospitality company in the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
